<MethodEndpoint

Configura la URL y el token para el servicio de WhatsApp.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"url_whatsapp":{"type":"string","example":"https://tu-url-whatsapp.com","description":"Ingresar la url base"},"token_whatsapp":{"type":"string","example":"tu-token-whatsapp","description":"Token proporcionado al conectar su WhatsApp"}},"title":"WhatsAppConfig"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
